# FarmLokal Project

Node.js + React + MySQL + Redis application with OAuth2, external API integration, and high-performance product listing.

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Node.js with Express.js
- Frontend: React.js
- Database: MySQL
- Cache: Redis
- Authentication: OAuth2 Client Credentials

## Features
- OAuth2 authentication with Redis token caching
- External API integration (synchronous + webhook)
- High-performance product listing API (1M+ records)
- Redis caching, rate limiting, circuit breaker
- Connection pooling optimization
